item.title: ShadowSock 快速上手
item.description: 这篇文章（5645566510638ccf2327a70e）是从 Teambition 迁移过来的 Server Install Debian / Ubuntu: apt-get install python-pip pip install shadowsocks CentOS: yum install python-setuptools && easy_install pip pip install shadowsocks Windows: See [Install Server on Windows] Usage ssserver -p 443 -k password -m aes-256-cfb To run in the background: sudo ssserver -p 443 -k password -m aes-256-cfb --user nobody -d start To stop: sudo ssserver -d stop To check the log:
